geologger.saints.com.geologger.map

クラス BaseMapWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • geologger.saints.com.geologger.map.BaseMapWorker
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    BaseMapWorker_, MapWorker

    public class BaseMapWorker
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Mizuno on 2015/02/12. Class for drawing objects on GoogleMapView You MUST call setMap at first of all
